runs.comm: back of a length outside off, a bit of outswing, left alone
a little closer to off stump, Rohit goes back and across, defends with soft hands into the off side, and it only takes a look up at his opening partner for the quick single to materialise
shortish outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, a bit of swing in towards off stump but Dhawan leaves again. On any other pitch, that would be a dangerous leave considering he hadn't moved across to cover his stumps
shortish outside off, dabbed down to third man
back of a length on off stump, back and across to defend into the on side
length ball on off stump, pushed into the off side for another quick single, dropped it down in front of the cover point fielder
length ball outside off, left alone
va bit of swing away outside off, but too wide to draw Rohit into a drive
back of a length outside off, carries through over Ramdin's head after Rohit leaves again
fullish outside off, nice stride forward to defend into the covers
back of a length outside off, defended towards point from a half-forward position
short outside off, angling in. Dhawan sways away from the line to leave it alone
banged in short wide outside off, seemed wide enough to be called wide, but the umpire gave Taylor the benefit of doubt
shortish outside off, rises to get on top of the bounce and carves it away through the backward point region
full, angling in towards off stump. Dhawan is caught on his crease a bit, no footwork at all, jams his bat down a touch late to defend towards second slip
short and wide, carved away in the air, bounces down to third man
full on off stump, defended to mid-off
length ball, angling in towards off stump. Dhawan uses the angle to nudge it into the on side for another quick single
length ball on off stump, defended to mid-on
back of a length outside off, and he simply rises with the bounce and rolls his wrists over the ball to knock it down a short distance away on the leg side. Another easily taken single
back of a length outside off, looks for another dabbed single into the off side but he's hit it too close to short third man

bouncer wide outside off, left alone. That could have been called wide for width and height, clearly went over Dhawan's head when viewed from side-on, but the umpire simply taps his shoulder to signal it was one bouncer for the over
back of a length outside off, poked into the covers for another single

gone! That was the perfect length in the corridor, and it straightened a touch after angling in from around the wicket. Dhawan pushed at it with an angled bat, and Sammy held the edge well to his right side at second slip
back of a length, angling into off stump, defended into the on side
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to defend back towards the bowler
in the blockhole just outside off, jams his bat down in a hurry to dig it out towards mid-off
back of a length, angling in. Kohli shuffles across to tuck it off his hips towards long leg
full on leg and middle, seemed to swing late and straighten towards the end of its flight. Rohit watched it all the way and defended with a straight bat down the pitch
length ball outside off, left alone
a bit fuller and wider. Kohli takes a big stride across, leaves again

he had gone a long way across his stumps and Holder bowled it fuller, angling it into the stumps. Has to play around his front pad, and it goes off his pad towards fine leg. I suppose that would be lbw anywhere else. Here, Holder doesn't even appeal
back of a length outside off, left alone
too full outside off, a bit of width too, and he drives it handsomely to the right of cover, finishes with left elbow high
back of a length outside off, left alone
full on middle stump, straightens very late. Kohli shapes to clip it through the leg side and it runs off his leading edge towards cover, where Russell misfields to allow the batsmen a single

full outside off, Rohit pushes away from his body with an open face, and it runs off his edge and Samuels, at a wide slip, doesn't have too far to fall to his left to stop it, doesn't get across in time
full on off stump, punched towards short midwicket
shortish, angling into the body, shuffles across to nudge it away backward of square
back of a length, fourth-stump line, defended off the back foot
gone! That is a beauty from Taylor, just short of driving length outside off. Rohit went for the drive away from his body, and it swung away late and kissed his edge through to Ramdin
that's full outside off, and Kohli leans his weight into the ball and presents a straight bat to send it scurrying away through the covers
shortish outside off, dabs it away to third man
back of a length, angling in towards off stump, defended towards cover point
back of a length outside off, left alone
length ball, angling in towards middle stump, defended back to the bowler
full on middle stump, clipped to short midwicket
length ball outside off, big stride out to defend into the covers
in the blockhole on off stump, jabbed away towards wide slip
very full outside off, jams his bat down on it and sends it rolling towards the slips off the outside edge. I'm not sure he got any bat on it, actually. May have just been bat on ground
fullish outside off and that is superb from Kohli. Big stride forward, shows the full face, and punches it between non-striker and mid-on
fullish on off stump, clipped away to the right of short midwicket
length ball on middle and off, plays around his front pad to tuck that away to long leg
full on off stump, punched to mid-on
shortish, angles it too far down the leg side
fullish outswinger wide outside off. Kohli goes for it and he's lucky he doesn't edge it
that's banged into Kohli's 'weak zone'. Fifth-stump line, back of a length. Kohli gets into that half-forward position, thinks about having a jab at it, decides at the last moment to leave it alone

fuller now and Kohli goes for the drive again, and the ball swings away and beats his edge. Half-hearted appeals from behind the wicket from a couple of fielders, not given. There's a bit of indecision about reviewing it, and they finally decide to take it. Snicko shows nothing. Plenty of distance between edge and ball too.
full on middle stump, and Kohli loves that, clips it away so easily to the midwicket boundary
wide outswinger outside off, swung away past the tramline
length ball on middle stump, tucked away through midwicket, and they complete three by the time Holder chases back to retrieve the ball
length ball on off stump, defended to mid-on

lbw appeal, not given, and they've wasted their review already. Kohli was halfway forward to drive and it came in from outside off and smacked painfully onto the back thigh. This is Perth, of course, and Hawkeye suggests it would have bounced over the stumps
full on off stump, punched to mid-on
full and wide, gets a nice stride in, head over the ball, to drive to cover
too full, and Kohli clips it away from off stump to his favourite midwicket boundary
a touch shorter this time but too straight again, finds the midwicket boundary once again, played with a straight bat and closed the face at the last instant
back of a length, fifth stump line, left alone, and it swings away after passing the batsman, causing Ramdin some discomfort, forcing him to dive low to his right
a bit closer to the batsman, but still wide enough to leave comfortably
and again, excellent length on a fifth-stump line. Rahane leaves again
in that same channel again, and Rahane is content to keep leaving them for now
back of a length, angling into leg stump. Tucked away off the hips towards fine leg
banged in short, Kohli ducks underneath
back of a length outside off, poked into the off side and they take another quick single, too quick for the point fielder
back of a length on middle stump, shuffles across to work it to long leg
short on leg stump, swivels to pull it down to long leg
back of a length outside off, defended towards point
short, Kohli can't connect with the hook, given wide for angling down the leg side
back of a length, too straight, worked off the hips towards long leg
back of a length on middle stump, lets it come on and tucks it away towards fine leg
back of a length, angling in towards off stump, defended to short cover
length ball on a fifth-stump line, left alone
back of a length on the same line, and finally Rahane has a little poke away from the body, he's lucky he didn't edge that
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to tuck it away towards square leg
full, angling into off stump, driven to short cover
back of a length on off stump, rises to his toes to defend back towards the bowler
back of a length on off stump, tucked away through square leg
short ball, and Rahane picks it up in a flash and pulled it over the square leg umpire, one bounce and over the rope
bouncer outside off, Rahane leans away, thinks about a ramp shot, decides against it
shortish ball rising over middle stump, gets on his toes to defend, straightens a touch, extra bounce, hits him on the right arm and pops into the off side
back of a length on off stump, looks for the dabbed single into the off side. Gets a thickish inside edge and drops it into the pitch
short down the leg side, swats it with the angle towards long leg

gone! That was a better short ball on this pitch. Batsmen have struggled to pull from outside off on this pitch, and Kohli's no exception, had to meet it at shoulder height, top-edges it and he spoons it straight down the throat of the man at long leg
back of a length on off stump, defended towards point. Roach has overstepped, just. Free-hit coming up.
in the blockhole, wide yorker almost, and Rahane toe-ends it towards cover. That might have broken his bat, calls for a replacement
back of a length on leg stump. Raina looks to shuffle across and work it leg side. Off his thigh pad towards fine leg
full and very wide outside off, nearly over the tramline. Goes for a wild drive and doesn't connect
length ball outside off, left alone, and Ramdin fumbles behind the stumps
shortish ball, rises to chest height as Raina shuffles across and plays a controlled pull down to long leg
back of a length outside off. Raina goes for an angled-bat chop and the ball misses his outside edge
short ball close to off stump, goes for the ramp but it slips past him too quick for that
shortish outside off, slapped away down to third man
shortish on off stump. Rahane jumps to get on top of the bounce and defend into the off side
short outside off, left alone
another bouncer, Rahane sways away from the line as it rises high over his right shoulder
shortish outside off, dabbed to backward point
full outside off, comes forward to drive to mid-off
length ball, lots of width, Raina times this away crisply, and Russell fumbles at cover point, gives away three. No-ball as well.
backs away to make room and Roach bowls a fast, almost waist high full-toss that just misses leg stump after Raina fails to connect with the slog
back of a length on off stump, lets it come on and dabs it with an open face to short third man
shot. That's a poor ball, lots of width outside off, and he came forward and slapped it away over extra cover

given! Made room to dab it down to third man, and the ball slipped past (or off) his edge very quickly through to Ramdin. Rahane reviews it. Replays look inconclusive. It straightened a touch and went very close to the outside edge. The bat, as it came down, hit the flap of his back pad. Seam position remained the same as the ball passed the bat.  There's a bit of a spike on Snicko, but it's hard to say if that was ball on edge or bat on pad. In the end, the third umpire upholds the decision. Interesting one, this.
back of a length, angling into middle stump, defended towards midwicket
short ball, on off stump, pulled down to deep backward square leg
oh my. This is banged in and it climbs and climbs and clears the leaping Ramdin behind the stumps, runs away for five wides
short outside off, left alone
another shortish ball outside off, another leave from Dhoni
aaaand again.
this one jags back in off the seam, but Dhoni leaves again, raising his bat way above his head to make sure there are no inadvertent nicks
shortish on off stump, defends on the hop into the leg side
length ball on off stump, gets a decent stride forward and defends into the on side
length ball outside off and he simply leans forward and punches it away through extra cover
length ball angling in towards middle stump, looks to clip it away, inside-edges it into his pad, rolls away through square leg
full outside off and that's a super shot from Raina. Simply shows the full face and the non-striker hops out of the way to let it scurry through to the long-off boundary
short ball, and that's not a convincing pull from Raina. Checked it at the end, top-edged it, and it bounced down in front of the long leg fielder
back of a length outside off, punched to short cover
shortish on leg stump, controlled pull off the hips down to long leg
This short ball gets up higher, and Raina plays another of those unconvincing half-pulls, scoops it up and it drops down towards deep square leg
back of a length outside off, shuffles across to poke it away to the right of short midwicket
full on off stump, defended back to the bowler
good short ball, rising over off stump, angling across. Raina sways out of the way, knees bent to get down low
short outside off and Raina goes hard at the slash, it was too close to him for that anyway, but he also loses his shape, and it beats his outside edge by a fair margin
length ball outside off. Dhoni shuffles forward and across and knocks it softly towards mid-on for a quick single
short, angling into Raina, who walks across his stumps and looks to hook. Can't connect
oooh, nearly. Another short ball, another awkward pull, and it pops in the air but just falls short of Roach, diving forward from midwicket
shortish on off stump, jumps back and across to defend towards short midwicket
banged in short, rises well over head height this time and Raina makes no attempt to play it
back of a length on off stump, dabbed down to short third man
short, angling down the leg side. Raina goes for the pull, gloves it wide of the keeper and it runs away to the fine leg boundary
back of a length on middle stump, walks across and tucks it away towards fine leg
length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, punched into the gap to the right of cover
short, angled too far down the leg side
back of a length outside off, jumps across and tucks it away through backward square leg
gone! Smith has struck! It isn't the greatest ball anyone has bowled today, it's short, a reasonable amount of width outside off, but Raina can only top-edge his slash through to the keeper
back of a length on off stump, hops to defend to backward point
back of a length outside off, punched towards backward point, where the fielder makes a super diving stop. Didn't quite pick up who it was.
fullish outside off, pushes it to the left of mid-off with a straight bat
shortish outside off, jumps across to dab it away to third man
short ball, Dhoni looks for the pull, there's a lot of extra bounce  and he ends up top-edging over the keeper
full, angling in towards off stump, presses forward to defend towards mid-on
good bouncer, angling in, Dhoni gets his left shoulder out of the way
full, a bit of swing, would have been a good ball to a right-hander, but it slips down the leg side against Jadeja
back of a length on leg stump, whipped off the hips to square leg
full, angling away from Jadeja, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone
beauty. Full, angling away, not quite driving length. Goes for the angled-bat drive and the ball beats his outside edge
and again. This one's a touch closer to off stump but still Jadeja can't connect with the drive
full on off stump, a bit of swing into Jadeja, punched to mid-off
back of a length outside off, punched away past the diving point fielder
length ball on off stump, shuffles across to work it to short midwicket
back of a length outside off, jumps across to poke it into the off side for another quick single
short ball, pulled away towards deep backward square leg
back of a length outside off, goes back and across to poke it away to backward point
back of a length outside off, again he skips a long way across to defend back to the bowler
full and wide and Jadeja reaches out and flat-bats it to the left of the cover fielder
back of a length outside off, rises to his toes to poke that to the left of backward point
back of a length on off stump, jabbed down to short third man
length ball in the corridor, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone
short, wide outside off at a gentle pace. Jadeja leaves it alone
shortish outside off, angling in. Goes back to punch through cover, ends up poking it back towards the bowler, off the inside half of the bat
fullish on off stump, clipped towards mid-on
short and wide, doesn't come on as quickly as Dhoni would like. Goes hard at it away from his body, chops it down towards point
full, angling into leg stump. Misses the flick, hits his front pad and rolls towards square leg
short outside off, sits up at waist height and Jadeja pulls it away over mid-on
much better. Bangs it in, bends his back, and Jadeja hops in the air and raises his hands up above his head to fend it down into the leg side, off the glove
length ball outside off, angling in, and it straightens off the pitch to beat Jadeja's flashing angled bat
short and wide, chopped away to the right of third man
full on middle stump, clipped away deftly to long leg
full outside off, jabbed away to the left of cover
full on leg stump, clipped away towards deep backward square leg
back of a length, angling into the body. Jadeja is on the hop to tuck that away into the leg side, inside-edges it into his pads
bangs in the bouncer, and that is waaaay over Dhoni's head
shortish outside off, squirted away to third man
back of a length ball wide outside off stump, Jadeja slashes and misses

another wicket off a short ball, another miscued pull. It's shoulder high outside off, that is the golden area in this match, and he top-edged it straight into the hands of Samuels at deep square leg. Nearly dropped it, but held on at the third attempt
back of a length on off stump, gets behind it to dab it away towards third man
full outside off, driven to mid-off
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to block it back towards the bowler
full on middle stump, defended down the ground towards long-on, short midwicket sprints across to intercept
banged in short, looks to attack the body, angles too far down the leg side
very full on off stump, a tiny bit of shape in, jams his bat down to punch that to mid-on
shortish outside off, gets on his toes and punches it away towards sweeper cover
full, angling down leg, misses the flick, goes off the pad towards square leg
back of a length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
short outside off, well left. Drops his wrists and sways his upper body out of the way
full on off stump, driven to mid-off. Aaand he's overstepped as well. By a long way.
free hit - very full outside off, and he swings hard and pops a low catch to mid-on
on the pads, clipped away to long leg
back of a length on leg stump, tucked away off the hips towards fine leg
short and wide and this fierce Dhoni uppercut sails all the way over the rope at fine third man

shortish, angling into the body. Shuffles across to work it away off his hips, bounces more than he expected, to chest height, and he pops it high in the air but well short of Smith at deep backward square leg
bangs it into the middle of the pitch. Ashwin ducks under it
short outside off, and Dhoni pulls it away, front leg going up in a prance, down to deep square leg
length ball on off stump, blocked towards short extra cover
fullish on middle stump, shuffles across to clip it away through square leg
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to work it away towards long leg
oh my. Bangs it in short, and ends up slanting it way down the leg side
shortish, rising ball angling into the body. Dhoni jumps up to tuck it into the off side, ball hits his chest
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to defend towards short midwicket
flat, back of a length, angling into leg stump. Worked away towards deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, flat-batted to mid-off
again it's back of a length, and Dhoni pushes it down to long-on for the easy single
length ball on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
a bit of flight outside off. Ashwin comes forward to defend towards point. A bit of bounce there, popped up off his glove
tossed up outside off, presses forward to push it back to the bowler
shortish on middle stump, pulled away towards long leg
short outside off, gets up to chest height, Ashwin can control the pull fairly easily towards deep square leg
back of a length on off stump, jumps across and tucks it away through square leg. Dhoni's picked up so many leg-side singles today.
short, down the leg side. Not the first time he's done it today. Ashwin walked across to pull, couldn't connect
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across and tucks it away to deep backward square leg
short and wide, Dhoni loves it there, gets on top of the bounce and chops it down through cover point
bouncer, again it's over the head, Ashwin's semi-crouch was only a precautionary measure
shortish outside off, defended towards short cover
tossed up outside off, gets his front foot across to clip it away wide of midwicket
back of a length outside off, goes back and across to push it back to the bowler
nice flight outside off, dips shorter than Ashwin would like, drives way out in front of his body, doesn't connect
length ball on middle and off, blocked back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, shuffles across to defend back towards the bowler
tossed up outside off, gets forward to clip it down to long-on
starts with a poor ball, back of a length, angling down the leg side
short ball, Ashwin can't connect with the hook
full outside off, driven to mid-off
full on middle stump, tucked away through square leg
back of a length outside off, uses his wrists to work it away towards mid-on
full, down the leg side, clipped away to the right of fine leg
short outside off, sits up nicely for Dhoni to pull to deep midwicket
tossed up on off stump, poked back towards the bowler, was in the air for a little bit
back of a length outside off, flat-batted down to long-on
back of a length outside off, steered away to the left of short third man
tossed up outside off, plonks his front foot forward to push it to short midwicket
flighted outside off, presses forward to block it back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, gets his front foot across and nurdles it towards square leg
short, sits up at waist height, pulled away to deep square leg
back of a length outside off, and Dhoni steers it away towards third man, maybe hit it a bit finer than he intended, off the outside half of the bat
back of a length, angling into off stump, defended back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, dabbed away to third man
short and wide and Dhoni gets on his toes to slap it away to the right of cover. He absolutely loves that shot, swivelling through his hips to get that power
full on leg stump, clipped away to long leg
tossed up outside off, and that is the win for India. Goes for a drive through cover, maybe, gets a thick outside edge that runs away towards the fine third man boundary
